lore: For years, the Djinns made their creators believe that they could not leave their lamps. They cautiously developed an elaborate plan to take control of the Refuge of the Magi.\n\nVulcanar was especially fascinated when he saw a Djinn Pyromancer accompanying one of Zonte's apprentices during a visit to the Great Pandemonium. This creature involuntarily alters the structure of spells and channels their energy to produce fire around it and burn its enemies.
menagerieDialog: Make a wish. The only rule is that you can't wish for more wishes.
The most powerful weapon is deceit. You'd do well to remember that.
I don't trust Everett. I think it's because his haircut is terrible.
Make a wish, then blow out the fire on my head.
Your creatures would be nothing without my support. You're welcome.
name: Djinn Pyromancer
